sentence.Network_en: Seryozhka is a sluggard, a drunkard.
sentence.Network_cn: 谢辽日卡是个懒汉, 酒鬼.

sentence.Network_en: We make the busy bee look like a lazy creature, the ant like a sluggard.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们令蜜蜂显得懒惰, 令蚂蚁看上去像懒汉.

sentence.Network_en: I will not, like a sluggard, wear out my youth in idleness at home.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不愿意象个懒人一样待在家里, 游手好闲地把我的青春消磨掉.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根及词缀 ... ） 24.-ard 表名词，“不好的人” ） sluggard n 懒鬼 humanitarian a/n 人道主义的（人）.
英语词汇的奥秘 ... wizard 奇才，男巫 sluggard 懒汉 niggard 守财奴.
英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... slugfest 激烈的殴斗 sluggard 偷懒者 sluggardly 懒惰的.
懒的意思 - 解释 - 网络字典 ... 懒货〖 lazybones〗 懒人〖 sluggard;idler〗 懒散〖 indolent;sluggish;negligent〗.

list.abs: intellectual sluggards are likely make a fortune , but it is impossible for them make achievements in the academic field .智力懒汉可能会发大财，不过他们绝对不可能在学术方面有所建树。
diligence is the mother of good luck. if plough deep while sluggard sleep , you will have corn to sell and to keep . ( benjamin. franklin america .勤奋是幸运之母；如果懒汉睡觉的时候你深耕土地，你就会有谷物出售和储存。（本杰明。弗兰克林)
way of a sluggard is overgrown with thorns ., 懒惰人的道上长满荆棘.
the sluggard says , " There is a lion outside ! " or , " I will be murdered in the streets ! "13懒惰人说，外头有狮子，我在街上，就必被杀

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from the rare verb slug 'be lazy or slow' + -ard

stems_affixes.word_buile: lag拖延,落后+ard不好的人→laggard缓慢的,落后的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 私生子;杂种;讨厌鬼;[俚]家伙;假冒品
stems_affixes.word_buile: bast愿意为结婚,后指不结婚而同居+ard不好的人→没结婚而生出来得的→私生子;杂种
cow威吓+ard不好的人→n.懦夫,胆怯者
drunk喝醉了的+ard不好的人→n.醉汉;酒鬼
lag拖延,落后+ard不好的人→laggard缓慢的,落后的人
nigg=niggle小气地做事+ard不好的人→n.吝啬鬼
slugg鼻涕虫[一种爬得很慢得虫];偷懒+ard不好的人→n.懒鬼

sentences.en: Seryozhka is a sluggard, a drunkard.
sentences.cn: 谢辽日卡是个懒汉，酒鬼。
